# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(scheme-statistics-max INTERFACE)
target_link_libraries(scheme-statistics-max INTERFACE
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  scheme-statistics-abstract
  engines-scheme-abstract
  columnshard-splitter-abstract
  core-formats-arrow
)

add_global_library_for(scheme-statistics-max.global scheme-statistics-max)
target_link_libraries(scheme-statistics-max.global PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  scheme-statistics-abstract
  engines-scheme-abstract
  columnshard-splitter-abstract
  core-formats-arrow
)
